article: Jim is an American boy. He is  _  New York. He likes  _  football matches,  _  he doesn't have enough money  to buy  tickets. He has to watch the matches  _  TV at home when he has  quite a little  homework. He  _  go to school from Monday to Friday, so he missed a lot of important football matches. A big football match would be held in the afternoon the next day.  _  wanted to watch it very much. But he couldn't. He would have a physics test in the  _  afternoon. "Can we have a video, mom?" Jim asked his mother  _  he went to school. "Then from our TV set you can record the match for me." "I'm  _  we can't afford one," said his mother. The next morning Jim went home with a smile,  _  a new video. "But where did you get the  _  , Jim?" His mother asked in  surprise  . "That's  _  , mom. I sold our TV set."
